summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 7.0°C) and outside temperature (down 6.2°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 12487 lux) and cloud levels (up 696 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14200 lux) and cloud levels (up 1644 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 695.8m lower than yesterday, 632.7m lower than the past week, 1643.8m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 1059m and a high of 3380m, averaging 1028.4m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Showers, occasional overcast conditions, and weak sunlight because of clouds. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
